panels.title: Apache httpd Status - Workers Percentage and Requests per Second

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "cmd-check-apache-httpd-status" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "service" = 'Apache httpd Status' AND "metric" = 'workers_free') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "metric"
